00022 
00023 template < typename T,
00024 typename V,
00025 typename Cmp,
00026 typename Items > class Node;
00027 
00028 template < typename T,
00029 typename V,
00030 typename Cmp,
00031 typename Items > class NodeItem
00032 {
00033 private:
00034     typedef Node<T, V, Cmp, Items> NodeClass;
00035     typedef NodeItem<T, V, Cmp, Items> NodeItemClass;
00036 
00037 public:
00038     NodeItem(const T &endSymbol, T const &key)
00039             : mEndSymbol(endSymbol),
00040             mKey(key),
00041             mChilds(0) {}
00042 
00043     virtual ~NodeItem() {
00044         delete mChilds;
00045     }
00046 
00047     bool operator<(NodeItemClass const &oth) const {
00048         return Cmp()(this->mKey, oth.mKey);
00049     }
00050 
00051     bool operator<(T const &key) const {
00052         return Cmp()(this->mKey, key);
00053     }
00054 
00055     bool operator==(T const &key) const {
00056         return !Cmp()(this->mKey, key) && !Cmp()(key, this->mKey);
00057     }
00058 
00059     bool operator==(NodeItemClass const &oth) const {
00060         return !Cmp()(this->mKey, oth.mKey) && !Cmp()(oth.mKey, this->mKey);
00061     }
00062 
00063     bool operator!=(T const &key) const {
00064         return !((*this) == key);
00065     }
00066 
00067     bool operator!=(NodeItemClass const &oth) const {
00068         return !((*this) == oth);
00069     }
00070 
00071     void set(T const &key) {
00072         mKey = key;
00073     }
00074 
00075     const T &get() const {
00076         return mKey;
00077     }
00078 
00079     const NodeClass *getChilds() const {
00080         return mChilds;
00081     }
00082 
00083     NodeClass *getChilds() {
00084         return mChilds;
00085     }
00086 
00087     NodeClass *getOrCreateChilds(NodeClass * parent) {
00088         createChilds(parent);
00089         return mChilds;
00090     }
00091 
00092 private:
00093     void createChilds(NodeClass * parent) {
00094         if (!mChilds) {
00095             mChilds = new NodeClass(mEndSymbol, parent);
00096         }
00097     }
00098 
00099     NodeItem(NodeItem const &);
00100     NodeItem &operator=(NodeItem const &);
00101 
00102 private:
00103     const T mEndSymbol;
00104     T mKey;
00105     NodeClass *mChilds;
00106 };
00107 
00108 template < typename T,
00109 typename V,
00110 typename Cmp,
00111 typename Items > class EndNodeItem: public NodeItem<T, V, Cmp, Items>
00112 {
00113 private:
00114     typedef NodeItem<T, V, Cmp, Items> ParentClass;
00115 
00116 public:
00117     EndNodeItem(const T &endSymbol, T const &key)
00118             : ParentClass(endSymbol, key) {}
00119 
00120     EndNodeItem(const T &endSymbol, T const &key, V const &value)
00121             : ParentClass(endSymbol, key),
00122             mValue(value) {}
00123 
00124     void set(T const &key, V const &value) {
00125         ParentClass::set(key);
00126         mValue = value;
00127     }
00128 
00129     const V &getValue() const {
00130         return mValue;
00131     }
00132 
00133     V &getValue() {
00134         return mValue;
00135     }
00136 
00137 private:
00138     EndNodeItem(EndNodeItem const &);
00139     EndNodeItem &operator=(EndNodeItem const &);
00140 
00141 private:
00142     V mValue;
00143 };

00145 template < typename T,
00146 typename V,
00147 typename Cmp,
00148 typename Items > class NodeItemPtrCompare
00149 {
00150 private:
00151     typedef NodeItem<T, V, Cmp, Items> NodeItemClass;
00152 
00153 public:
00154     bool operator()(const NodeItemClass *v1, const NodeItemClass *v2) {
00155         return *v1 < *v2;
00156     }
00157 };
00158 
00159 template < typename T,
00160 typename V,
00161 typename Cmp,
00162 typename Items > class Node
00163 {
00164 public:
00165     typedef NodeItem<T, V, Cmp, Items> NodeItemClass;
00166     typedef EndNodeItem<T, V, Cmp, Items> EndNodeItemClass;
00167     typedef Node<T, V, Cmp, Items> NodeClass;
00168 
00169 public:
00170 
00171     class ConstIterator
00172     {
00173     protected:
00174         typedef std::pair<const T *, const V *> KeyValuePair;
00175         typedef typename NodeClass::ItemsContainerConstIter ItemsContainerConstIter;
00176 
00177     public:
00178         ConstIterator(const NodeClass *node, const T * key = 0, bool mooveToEnd = false)
00179                 : mRootNode(node),
00180                   mCurrentNode(node),
00181                   mCheckKeyLeft(false),
00182                   mCheckKeyRight(true),
00183                   mEndReached(false) {
00184             pushNode(node, key, mooveToEnd);
00185             if (!mooveToEnd) {
00186                 next();
00187             }
00188         }
00189 
00190         ConstIterator(const ConstIterator & oth)
00191                 : mRootNode(oth.mRootNode),
00192                 mCurrentNode(oth.mCurrentNode),
00193                 mCurrentPos(oth.mCurrentPos),
00194                 mKeyStack(oth.mKeyStack),
00195                 mCheckKeyLeft(oth.mCheckKeyLeft),
00196                 mCheckKeyRight(oth.mCheckKeyRight),
00197                 mEndReached(oth.mEndReached) {
00198             if (!mKeyStack.empty()) {
00199                 mKeyValuePair = std::make_pair(&mKeyStack[0], oth.mKeyValuePair.second);
00200             }
00201         }
00202 
00203         ConstIterator & operator=(const ConstIterator & oth) {
00204             if (this != &oth) {
00205                 mRootNode = oth.mRootNode;
00206                 mCurrentNode = oth.mCurrentNode;
00207                 mCurrentPos = oth.mCurrentPos;
00208                 mKeyStack = oth.mKeyStack;
00209                 if (!mKeyStack.empty()) {
00210                     mKeyValuePair = std::make_pair(&mKeyStack[0], oth.mKeyValuePair.second);
00211                 }
00212                 mCheckKeyLeft = oth.mCheckKeyLeft;
00213                 mCheckKeyRight = oth.mCheckKeyRight;
00214                 mEndReached = oth.mEndReached;
00215             }
00216             return *this;
00217         }
00218 
00219         const KeyValuePair &operator*() const {
00220             return this->mKeyValuePair;
00221         }
00222 
00223         const KeyValuePair *operator->() const {
00224             return &this->mKeyValuePair;
00225         }
00226 
00227         bool operator==(ConstIterator const &oth) const {
00228             return this->equals(oth);
00229         }
00230 
00231         bool operator!=(ConstIterator const &oth) const {
00232             return !(*this == oth);
00233         }
00234 
00235         ConstIterator operator++(int) {
00236             ConstIterator iter = *this;
00237             ++(*this);
00238             return iter;
00239         }
00240 
00241         ConstIterator &operator++() {
00242             this->next();
00243             return *this;
00244         }
00245 
00246         ConstIterator operator--(int) {
00247             ConstIterator iter = *this;
00248             --(*this);
00249             return iter;
00250         }
00251 
00252         ConstIterator &operator--() {
00253             this->previous();
00254             return *this;
00255         }
00256 
00257     protected:
00258         friend class Node<T, V, Cmp, Items>;
00259 
00260         const NodeClass * mRootNode;
00261         const NodeClass * mCurrentNode;
00262         ItemsContainerConstIter mCurrentPos;
00263         std::vector<T> mKeyStack;
00264         KeyValuePair mKeyValuePair;
00265         bool mCheckKeyLeft;
00266         bool mCheckKeyRight;
00267         bool mEndReached;
00268 
00269     protected:
00270         void previous() {
00271             if (mCurrentPos == mCurrentNode->mItems.end()) {
00272                 --mCurrentPos;
00273             }
00274 
00275             bool newNode = false;
00276             bool oldNode = false;
00277 
00278             while (mEndReached || !isLeftEnd()) {
00279                 mEndReached = false;
00280                 ItemsContainerConstIter iterBegin = mCurrentNode->mItems.begin();
00281                 if (!mKeyStack.empty()) {
00282                     if (mKeyStack.back() == mCurrentNode->endSymbol()) {
00283                         mKeyStack.pop_back();
00284                         mCurrentPos = mCurrentNode->mItems.begin();
00285                         if (isLeftEnd()) {
00286                             break;
00287                         }
00288                     }
00289                 }
00290 
00291                 if (!newNode && !mKeyStack.empty()) {
00292                     if (mCheckKeyLeft) {
00293                         mCurrentNode = mCurrentNode->parent();
00294                         mCurrentPos = mCurrentNode->mItems.find(mKeyStack.back());
00295                         iterBegin = mCurrentNode->mItems.begin();
00296                         mKeyStack.pop_back();
00297                         mCheckKeyLeft = false;
00298                         if (mCurrentPos != iterBegin) {
00299                             --mCurrentPos;
00300                             oldNode = false;
00301                         } else {
00302                             oldNode = true;
00303                         }
00304                     } else {
00305                         ItemsContainerConstIter iter = mCurrentNode->mItems.find(mCurrentNode->endSymbol());
00306                         if (iter != mCurrentNode->mItems.end()) {
00307                             mCurrentPos = iter;
00308                             const NodeItemClass & item = *(const NodeItemClass *) * mCurrentPos;
00309                             mKeyStack.push_back(item.get());
00310                             mKeyValuePair.first = &(mKeyStack[0]);
00311                             mKeyValuePair.second = &(((const EndNodeItemClass &)item).getValue());
00312                             mCheckKeyLeft = true;
00313                             return;
00314                         } else {
00315                             mCurrentNode = mCurrentNode->parent();
00316                             mCurrentPos = mCurrentNode->mItems.find(mKeyStack.back());
00317                             iterBegin = mCurrentNode->mItems.begin();
00318                             mKeyStack.pop_back();
00319                             mCheckKeyLeft = false;
00320                             if (mCurrentPos != iterBegin) {
00321                                 --mCurrentPos;
00322                                 oldNode = false;
00323                             } else {
00324                                 oldNode = true;
00325                             }
00326                         }
00327                     }
00328                 }
00329 
00330                 newNode = false;
00331                 for (; mCurrentPos != iterBegin; --mCurrentPos) {
00332                     if (*mCurrentPos) {
00333                         const NodeItemClass &item = *(const NodeItemClass *) * mCurrentPos;
00334                         if (item != mCurrentNode->endSymbol()) {
00335                             mKeyStack.push_back(item.get());
00336                             pushNode(item.getChilds(), 0, true);
00337                             --mCurrentPos;
00338                             newNode = true;
00339                             break;
00340                         }
00341                     }
00342                     oldNode = false;
00343                 }
00344                 if (!newNode && !oldNode) {
00345                     if (*mCurrentPos) {
00346                         const NodeItemClass &item = *(const NodeItemClass *) * mCurrentPos;
00347                         if (item != mCurrentNode->endSymbol()) {
00348                             mKeyStack.push_back(item.get());
00349                             pushNode(item.getChilds(), 0, true);
00350                             --mCurrentPos;
00351                             newNode = true;
00352                         }
00353                     }
00354                 }
00355 
00356             }
00357             mCurrentPos = mCurrentNode->mItems.end();
00358         }
00359 
00360         void next() {
00361             while (!isEnd()) {
00362                 ItemsContainerConstIter iterEnd = mCurrentNode->mItems.end();
00363 
00364                 if (!mKeyStack.empty()) {
00365                     if (mKeyStack.back() == mCurrentNode->endSymbol()) {
00366                         mKeyStack.pop_back();
00367                         mCurrentPos = mCurrentNode->mItems.begin();
00368                     }
00369                 }
00370 
00371                 if (mCurrentPos == iterEnd && !mKeyStack.empty()) {
00372                     mCurrentNode = mCurrentNode->parent();
00373                     mCurrentPos = mCurrentNode->mItems.find(mKeyStack.back());
00374                     ++mCurrentPos;
00375                     iterEnd = mCurrentNode->mItems.end();
00376                     mKeyStack.pop_back();
00377                 }
00378 
00379                 for (; mCurrentPos != iterEnd; ++mCurrentPos) {
00380                     if (mCheckKeyRight) {
00381                         mCheckKeyRight = false;
00382                         ItemsContainerConstIter iter = mCurrentNode->mItems.find(mCurrentNode->endSymbol());
00383                         if (iter != iterEnd) {
00384                             mCurrentPos = iter;
00385                             const NodeItemClass & item = *(const NodeItemClass *) * mCurrentPos;
00386                             mKeyStack.push_back(item.get());
00387                             mKeyValuePair.first = &(mKeyStack[0]);
00388                             mKeyValuePair.second = &(((const EndNodeItemClass &)item).getValue());
00389                             mCheckKeyLeft = true;
00390                             return;
00391                         }
00392                     }
00393 
00394                     if (*mCurrentPos) {
00395                         const NodeItemClass &item = *(const NodeItemClass *) * mCurrentPos;
00396                         if (item != mCurrentNode->endSymbol()) {
00397                             mKeyStack.push_back(item.get());
00398                             pushNode(item.getChilds());
00399                             break;
00400                         }
00401                     }
00402                 }
00403             }
00404             mEndReached = true;
00405         }
00406 
00407         bool isEnd() const {
00408             if (this->mRootNode == this->mCurrentNode &&
00409                 this->mCurrentPos == this->mCurrentNode->mItems.end()) {
00410                 return true;
00411             }
00412             return false;
00413         }
00414 
00415         bool isLeftEnd() const {
00416             if (this->mRootNode == this->mCurrentNode &&
00417                 this->mCurrentPos == this->mCurrentNode->mItems.begin()) {
00418                 return true;
00419             }
00420             return false;
00421         }
00422 
00423         bool equals(const ConstIterator & oth) const {
00424             if (this->isEnd() && oth.isEnd()) {
00425                 return true;
00426             }
00427 
00428             if (this->mCurrentNode == oth.mCurrentNode &&
00429                     this->mCurrentPos  == oth.mCurrentPos) {
00430                 return true;
00431             }
00432 
00433             return false;
00434         }
00435 
00436         void pushNode(const NodeClass *node, const T * key = 0, bool mooveToEnd = false) {
00437             mCurrentNode = node;
00438             mCheckKeyLeft = false;
00439             if (mooveToEnd) {
00440                 mCurrentPos = mCurrentNode->mItems.end();
00441                 mEndReached = true;
00442                 mCheckKeyRight = false;
00443             } else {
00444                 if (key) {
00445                     for (int i = 0; key[i] != node->endSymbol(); ++i) {
00446                         mKeyStack.push_back(key[i]);
00447                     }
00448                 }
00449                 mCurrentPos = node->mItems.begin();
00450                 mCheckKeyRight = true;
00451             }
00452         }
00453     };
00454 
00455     class Iterator : public ConstIterator
00456     {
00457     private:
00458         typedef std::pair<const T *, V *> MutableKeyValuePair;
00459         MutableKeyValuePair mMutableKeyValuePair;
00460 
00461     private:
00462         MutableKeyValuePair & getPair() {
00463             mMutableKeyValuePair.first = this->mKeyValuePair.first;
00464             mMutableKeyValuePair.second = const_cast<V *>(this->mKeyValuePair.second);
00465             return this->mMutableKeyValuePair;
00466         }
00467 
00468     public:
00469         Iterator(NodeClass *node, const T * key = 0, bool mooveToEnd = false)
00470                 : ConstIterator(node, key, mooveToEnd) {}
00471 
00472         MutableKeyValuePair &operator*() {
00473             return getPair();
00474         }
00475 
00476         MutableKeyValuePair *operator->() {
00477             return &(getPair());
00478         }
00479 
00480         Iterator operator++(int) {
00481             Iterator iter = *this;
00482             ++(*this);
00483             return iter;
00484         }
00485 
00486         Iterator &operator++() {
00487             this->next();
00488             return *this;
00489         }
00490 
00491         Iterator operator--(int) {
00492             Iterator iter = *this;
00493             --(*this);
00494             return iter;
00495         }
00496 
00497         Iterator &operator--() {
00498             this->previous();
00499             return *this;
00500         }
00501     };
00502 
00503 private:
00504     Node(Node const &);
00505     Node &operator=(Node const &);
00506 
00507     static void deleteItem(NodeItemClass *item) {
00508         delete item;
00509     }
00510 
00511     const V *get(const T *key, int i) const {
00512         return const_cast<NodeClass *>(this)->get(key, i);
00513     }
00514 
00515     V *get(const T *key, int i) {
00516         NodeItemClass *item = mItems.getItem(key[i]);
00517         if (!item) {
00518             return 0;
00519         } else if (key[i] == mEndSymbol && *item == mEndSymbol) {
00520             return &(((EndNodeItemClass *)item)->getValue());
00521         } else {
00522             return item->getChilds()->get(key, ++i);
00523         }
00524     }
00525 
00526     NodeClass * findKey(const T *key, int i) {
00527         NodeItemClass *item = mItems.getItem(key[i]);
00528         if (!item) {
00529             return 0;
00530         } else if (key[i] == mEndSymbol && *item == mEndSymbol) {
00531             return this;
00532         } else {
00533             return item->getChilds()->findKey(key, ++i);
00534         }
00535     }
00536 
00537     NodeClass * startsWith(const T *prefix, int i) {
00538         if (prefix[i] == mEndSymbol) {
00539             return this;
00540         }
00541         NodeItemClass *item = mItems.getItem(prefix[i]);
00542         if (!item) {
00543             return 0;
00544         } else {
00545             return item->getChilds()->startsWith(prefix, ++i);
00546         }
00547     }
00548 
00549     bool hasKey(const T *key, int i) const {
00550         const NodeItemClass *item = mItems.getItem(key[i]);
00551         if (!item) {
00552             return false;
00553         } else if (key[i] == mEndSymbol && *item == mEndSymbol) {
00554             return true;
00555         } else {
00556             return item->getChilds()->hasKey(key, ++i);
00557         }
00558     }
00559 
00560     std::pair<Iterator, bool> insertData(const T *key, V const &value, int i) {
00561         std::pair<Iterator, bool> result(end(), false);
00562         std::pair<typename Items::Item *, bool> itemPair = mItems.insertItem(key[i]);
00563         NodeItemClass *item = itemPair.first;
00564         if (itemPair.second) {
00565             result.first = Iterator(this, key);
00566             return result;
00567         }
00568         if (!item) {
00569             return result;
00570         } else if (key[i] == mEndSymbol) {
00571             ((EndNodeItemClass *)item)->set(key[i], value);
00572             result.first = Iterator(this, key);
00573             result.second = true;
00574         } else {
00575             return item->getOrCreateChilds(this)->insertData(key, value, ++i);
00576         }
00577         return result;
00578     }
00579 
00580     bool erase(NodeClass * node, const T * key, int keyIndex = 0) {
00581         bool erased = false;
00582 
00583         if (node && key) {
00584             erased = true;
00585             bool finished = false;
00586             int count = 0;
00587             ItemsContainerIter iterEnd = node->mItems.end();
00588 
00589             if (!keyIndex) {
00590                 while (key[keyIndex] != node->endSymbol()) {
00591                     ++ keyIndex;
00592                 }
00593             }
00594 
00595             while (node && !finished) {
00596                 ItemsContainerIter iterEnd = node->mItems.end();
00597 
00598                 count = 0;
00599                 for (ItemsContainerIter iter = node->mItems.begin(); iter != iterEnd; ++iter) {
00600                     if (*iter != 0) {
00601                         ++count;
00602                     }
00603                 }
00604 
00605                 if (count > 1) {
00606                     node->mItems.eraseItem(key[keyIndex]);
00607                     finished = true;
00608                 } else if (count == 1) {
00609                     node->mItems.eraseItem(key[keyIndex]);
00610                 }
00611 
00612                 --keyIndex;
00613                 node = node->parent();
00614             }
00615 
00616         }
00617 
00618         return erased;
00619     }
00620 
00621     bool erase(const T *key, int i, bool &finished) {
00622         bool erased = false;
00623         NodeItemClass *item = mItems.getItem(key[i]);
00624 
00625         if (!item) {
00626             return erased;
00627         }
00628 
00629         if (key[i] == mEndSymbol && *item == mEndSymbol) {
00630             erased = erase(this, key, i);
00631         } else {
00632             erased = item->getChilds()->erase(key, i + 1, finished);
00633         }
00634 
00635         return erased;
00636     }
00637 
00638 public:
00639     Node(const T &eSymbol, NodeClass * parent = 0)
00640             : mItems(eSymbol),
00641             mEndSymbol(eSymbol),
00642             mSize(0),
00643             mParent(parent) {}
00644 
00645     ~Node() {
00646         clear();
00647     }
00648 
00649     T endSymbol() const {
00650         return mEndSymbol;
00651     }
00652 
00653     void clear() {
00654         std::for_each(mItems.begin(), mItems.end(), deleteItem);
00655         mItems.clear();
00656         mSize = 0;
00657     }
00658 
00659     bool empty() const {
00660         return size() == 0;
00661     }
00662 
00663     unsigned int size() const {
00664         return mSize;
00665     }
00666 
00667     std::pair<Iterator, bool> insert(const T *key, V const &value) {
00668         std::pair<Iterator, bool> r = insertData(key, value, 0);
00669         if (r.second) {
00670             ++mSize;
00671         }
00672         return r;
00673     }
00674 
00675     bool erase(Iterator pos) {
00676         bool erased = false;
00677         if (pos.mCurrentNode && pos.mCurrentPos != pos.mCurrentNode->mItems.end()) {
00678             erased = erase(const_cast<NodeClass *>(pos.mCurrentNode), pos->first);
00679         }
00680         if (erased) {
00681             --mSize;
00682         }
00683         return erased;
00684     }
00685 
00686     bool erase(const T *key) {
00687         bool finished = false;
00688         bool erased = erase(key, 0, finished);
00689         if (erased) {
00690             --mSize;
00691         }
00692         return erased;
00693     }
00694 
00695     const V *get(const T *key) const {
00696         return get(key, 0);
00697     }
00698 
00699     V *get(const T *key) {
00700         return get(key, 0);
00701     }
00702 
00703     bool hasKey(const T *key) const {
00704         return hasKey(key, 0);
00705     }
00706 
00707     const NodeClass * parent() const {
00708         return mParent;
00709     }
00710 
00711     NodeClass * parent() {
00712         return mParent;
00713     }
00714 
00715     ConstIterator begin() const {
00716         return ConstIterator(this);
00717     }
00718 
00719     ConstIterator end() const {
00720         return ConstIterator(this, 0, true);
00721     }
00722 
00723     Iterator begin() {
00724         return Iterator(this);
00725     }
00726 
00727     Iterator end() {
00728         return Iterator(this, 0, true);
00729     }
00730 
00731     ConstIterator find(const T *key) const {
00732         NodeClass * node = const_cast<NodeClass *>(this)->findKey(key, 0);
00733         if (!node) {
00734             return ConstIterator(this, 0, true);
00735         } else {
00736             return ConstIterator(node, key);
00737         }
00738     }
00739 
00740     Iterator find(const T *key) {
00741         NodeClass * node = this->findKey(key, 0);
00742         if (!node) {
00743             return Iterator(this, 0, true);
00744         } else {
00745             return Iterator(node, key);
00746         }
00747     }
00748 
00749     Iterator startsWith(const T *prefix) {
00750         NodeClass * node = this->startsWith(prefix, 0);
00751         if (!node) {
00752             return Iterator(this, 0, true);
00753         } else {
00754             return Iterator(node, prefix);
00755         }
00756     }
00757 
00758     ConstIterator startsWith(const T *prefix) const {
00759         NodeClass * node = const_cast<NodeClass *>(this)->startsWith(prefix, 0);
00760         if (!node) {
00761             return ConstIterator(this, 0, true);
00762         } else {
00763             return ConstIterator(node, prefix);
00764         }
00765     }
00766 
00767 private:
00768     typedef typename Items::iterator ItemsContainerIter;
00769     typedef typename Items::const_iterator ItemsContainerConstIter;
00770 
00771     Items mItems;
00772     const T mEndSymbol;
00773     unsigned int mSize;
00774     NodeClass * mParent;
00775 };
00776 
00780 template <typename T> class SymbolToIndexMapper
00781 {
00782 public:
00783     unsigned int operator()(const T & c) const {
00784         return static_cast<unsigned int>(c);
00785     }
00786 };
00787 
00800 template < typename T,
00801 typename V,
00802 typename Cmp,
00803 int Max = 256,
00804 typename M = SymbolToIndexMapper<T> > class VectorItems
00805 {
00806 public:
00807     typedef NodeItem<T, V, Cmp, VectorItems<T, V, Cmp, Max, M> > Item;
00808     typedef std::vector<Item *> Items;
00809     typedef typename Items::iterator iterator;
00810     typedef typename Items::const_iterator const_iterator;
00811     typedef Node<T, V, Cmp, VectorItems<T, V, Cmp, Max, M> > NodeClass;
00812     typedef typename NodeClass::NodeItemClass NodeItemClass;
00813     typedef typename NodeClass::EndNodeItemClass EndNodeItemClass;
00814 
00815 public:
00816     VectorItems(T const &endSymbol)
00817             : mEndSymbol(endSymbol),
00818             mItems(Max, (Item *)0) {}
00819 
00820     const_iterator find(const T & k) const {
00821         const Item * item = getItem(k);
00822         if (item) {
00823             return mItems.begin() + mSymolToIndex(k);
00824         }
00825         return mItems.end();
00826     }
00827 
00828     iterator find(const T & k) {
00829         const Item * item = getItem(k);
00830         if (item) {
00831             return mItems.begin() + mSymolToIndex(k);
00832         }
00833         return mItems.end();
00834     }
00835 
00836     iterator begin() {
00837         return mItems.begin();
00838     }
00839 
00840     const_iterator begin() const {
00841         return mItems.begin();
00842     }
00843 
00844     iterator end() {
00845         return mItems.end();
00846     }
00847 
00848     const_iterator end() const {
00849         return mItems.end();
00850     }
00851 
00852     void clear() {
00853         std::fill(mItems.begin(), mItems.end(), (Item *)0);
00854     }
00855 
00856     bool empty() const {
00857         return mItems.empty();
00858     }
00859 
00860     std::pair<Item *, bool> insertItem(T const &k) {
00861         std::pair<Item *, bool> ret((Item *)0, false);
00862         if (!getItem(k)) {
00863             assignItem(k, createNodeItem(k));
00864             ret.first = getItem(k);
00865         } else {
00866             ret.first = getItem(k);
00867             if (k == mEndSymbol) {
00868                 ret.second = true;
00869             }
00870         }
00871         return ret;
00872     }
00873 
00874     bool eraseItem(T const &k) {
00875         Item * item = getItem(k);
00876         if (item) {
00877             delete item;
00878             assignItem(k, (Item *)0);
00879             return true;
00880         } else {
00881             return false;
00882         }
00883     }
00884 
00885     Item *getItem(T const &k) {
00886         return mItems[mSymolToIndex(k)];
00887     }
00888 
00889     const Item *getItem(T const &k) const {
00890         return mItems[mSymolToIndex(k)];
00891     }
00892 
00893     void assignItem(T k, Item *i) {
00894         mItems[mSymolToIndex(k)] = i;
00895     }
00896 
00897     NodeItemClass *createNodeItem(T const &k) {
00898         if (k == mEndSymbol) {
00899             return new EndNodeItemClass(mEndSymbol, k);
00900         } else {
00901             return new NodeItemClass(mEndSymbol, k);
00902         }
00903     }
00904 
00905 protected:
00906     const T mEndSymbol;
00907     Items mItems;
00908     M mSymolToIndex;
00909 };
00910 
00922 template < typename T,
00923 typename V,
00924 typename Cmp > class SetItems
00925 {
00926 public:
00927     typedef NodeItem<T, V, Cmp, SetItems<T, V, Cmp> > Item;
00928     typedef std::set<Item *, NodeItemPtrCompare<T, V, Cmp, SetItems<T, V, Cmp> > > Items;
00929     typedef typename Items::iterator iterator;
00930     typedef typename Items::const_iterator const_iterator;
00931     typedef Node<T, V, Cmp, SetItems<T, V, Cmp> > NodeClass;
00932     typedef typename NodeClass::NodeItemClass NodeItemClass;
00933     typedef typename NodeClass::EndNodeItemClass EndNodeItemClass;
00934 
00935 public:
00936     SetItems(T const &endSymbol)
00937             : mEndSymbol(endSymbol) {}
00938 
00939     const_iterator find(const T & k) const {
00940         return const_cast<SetItems<T, V, Cmp> *>(this)->find(k);
00941     }
00942 
00943     iterator find(const T & k) {
00944         Item tmp(mEndSymbol, k);
00945         return mItems.find(&tmp);
00946     }
00947 
00948     iterator begin() {
00949         return mItems.begin();
00950     }
00951 
00952     const_iterator begin() const {
00953         return mItems.begin();
00954     }
00955 
00956     iterator end() {
00957         return mItems.end();
00958     }
00959 
00960     const_iterator end() const {
00961         return mItems.end();
00962     }
00963 
00964     bool empty() const {
00965         return mItems.empty();
00966     }
00967 
00968     void clear() {
00969         mItems.clear();
00970     }
00971 
00972     std::pair<Item *, bool> insertItem(T const &k) {
00973         std::pair<Item *, bool> ret((Item*)0, false);
00974         Item tmp(mEndSymbol, k);
00975         iterator iter = mItems.find(&tmp);
00976         if (iter == mItems.end()) {
00977             Item *v = createNodeItem(k);
00978             mItems.insert(v);
00979             ret.first = v;
00980         } else {
00981             ret.first = (Item *) * iter;
00982             if (k == mEndSymbol) {
00983                 ret.second = true;
00984             }
00985         }
00986         return ret;
00987     }
00988 
00989     bool eraseItem(T const &k) {
00990         Item tmp(mEndSymbol, k);
00991         iterator iter = mItems.find(&tmp);
00992         if (iter != mItems.end()) {
00993             delete *iter;
00994             mItems.erase(iter);
00995             return true;
00996         } else {
00997             return false;
00998         }
00999     }
01000 
01001     const Item *getItem(T const &k) const {
01002         return const_cast<SetItems *>(this)->getItem(k);
01003     }
01004 
01005     Item *getItem(T const &k) {
01006         Item tmp(mEndSymbol, k);
01007 
01008         iterator iter = mItems.find(&tmp);
01009         if (iter == mItems.end()) {
01010             return 0;
01011         }
01012         return (Item *)(*iter);
01013     }
01014 
01015     NodeItemClass *createNodeItem(T const &k) {
01016         if (k == mEndSymbol) {
01017             return new EndNodeItemClass(mEndSymbol, k);
01018         } else {
01019             return new NodeItemClass(mEndSymbol, k);
01020         }
01021     }
01022 
01023 protected:
01024     const T mEndSymbol;
01025     Items mItems;
01026 };
01027 
01272 template < typename T,
01273 typename V,
01274 typename Cmp = std::less<T>,
01275 typename Items = SetItems<T, V, Cmp> > class Trie
01276 {
01277 public:
01278     typedef typename Node<T, V, Cmp, Items>::Iterator Iterator;
01279     typedef typename Node<T, V, Cmp, Items>::ConstIterator ConstIterator;
01280 
01281 public:
01285     Trie(const T &endSymbol)
01286             : mRoot(endSymbol) {}
01287 
01294     std::pair<Iterator, bool> insert(const T *key, V const &value) {
01295         return mRoot.insert(key, value);
01296     }
01297 
01303     bool erase(const T *key) {
01304         return mRoot.erase(key);
01305     }
01306 
01312     bool erase(Iterator pos) {
01313         return mRoot.erase(pos);
01314     }
01315 
01321     const V *get(const T *key) const {
01322         return mRoot.get(key);
01323     }
01324 
01330     V *get(const T *key) {
01331         return mRoot.get(key);
01332     }
01333 
01341     V &operator[](const T *key) {
01342         return *(insert(key, V()).first->second);
01343     }
01344 
01350     bool hasKey(const T *key) const {
01351         return mRoot.hasKey(key);
01352     }
01353 
01358     bool empty() const {
01359         return mRoot.empty();
01360     }
01361 
01366     unsigned int size() const {
01367         return mRoot.size();
01368     }
01369 
01373     void clear() {
01374         mRoot.clear();
01375     }
01376 
01382     Iterator startsWith(const T *prefix) {
01383         return mRoot.startsWith(prefix);
01384     }
01385 
01391     ConstIterator startsWith(const T *prefix) const {
01392         return mRoot.startsWith(prefix);
01393     }
01394 
01399     T endSymbol() const {
01400         return mRoot.endSymbol();
01401     }
01402 
01407     Iterator begin() {
01408         return mRoot.begin();
01409     }
01410 
01415     Iterator end() {
01416         return mRoot.end();
01417     }
01418 
01424     Iterator find(const T *key) {
01425         return mRoot.find(key);
01426     }
01427 
01433     ConstIterator find(const T *key) const {
01434         return mRoot.find(key);
01435     }
01436 
01441     ConstIterator begin() const {
01442         return mRoot.begin();
01443     }
01444 
01449     ConstIterator end() const {
01450         return mRoot.end();
01451     }
01452 
01453 private:
01454     Trie(Trie const &);
01455     Trie &operator=(Trie const &);
01456 
01457 private:
01458     Node<T, V, Cmp, Items> mRoot;
01459 };
